So, who am I?

You can call me...Billy

I am a web designer, print designer, and brand designer. I come from a labor union background where I built up a communications department from scratch. I have a passion for computers and creating things that others appreciate.

I strive to create bold, simple, professional work and sometimes, like with this website, I like to find ways to add a little personality. So not only do I want to give you an idea of my work, but I want to give you an idea of the things I enjoy.

This website is not yet complete. I am still figuring out what I want to do here, but since you are here you might be interested in taking a look at some of my work. The PDF icon will take you there.
